messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Thanks for these but I am not sure how user-friendly we really
want to make this package.  People are not supposed to be using
it unless they are synchronization experts.  They should be using
higher-level primitives.  I am afraid that putting in examples like
these will lead to people writing code like this, which they really
should not be 99% of the time.

Russ
